title: Will robots take over the hairdressing industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: Delaware licensed Cosmetologist No, clients don’t come back because of the style, they come back for the intimate service of having their hair shampooed, being able to open up to their therapist , I mean stylist. Robots aren’t able to give you advice on dating or which highlights will look good for your complexion and make your hair look fuller.
